This game truly is great and is absolutely worth a try when it is on sale.

"One of the greatest multiplayer games ever made"!  The only community where I spent thousands of hours playing mods and creating new favorable and memorable memories.
buen juego para pasar un buen rato con amigos :'D

The best game i've ever played! Great Community and Custom Maps. So many different custom modes. Jail, bhop, surf. deathrun, prop hunt, gungame, minigames and so much more! Sadly the gold times of CSS are over and it hurts to see the game dying. Never forget the 2008-2011 golden era of this game
Я в этой игре оставил своё детство

Игра достаточно старая,но очень интересная там есть и плюсы и минусы.
-Читеры (они встречаются редко чаще всего на серверах без щитка (VAC)
-Мало разнообразия 
Плюсы
+Графика (я думаю некторым она понравится, но игра старая и уже графика устарела хотя раньше была очень хорошая)
+Комьюнити (за несколько лет я встречал игроков которые не агрятся и вполне спокойные ( раньше играл на пиратке))) )

amazing game with an amazing community
agruably the best counter strike game created
Если найтигде поиграть, а главное - с кем, то зайдёт)
Jen si zde venčím svůj odznak

Bir CS serisinin efsanesi.

Oyun ''Source Motoru''nu denemek için yapıldı ve kısa sürede büyük bir kitleye hitap etti.

Eskisi kadar oynanmasada hala oynayanlar  var.

So here is my "first review"

Cs source was published by Valve around 2004 and is the sucessor of the cs conditional zero. Offering  a brand new source engine (2004 source engine, not a bit new, more than 10 years), better graphics, better physics and brand new steam  achievements.

Gamemodes is still the same on previous cs series, like hostage rescue and some casual, plus there is custom gamemodes created by community if someone is interested like deathmatch, AWP matches, Zombie Escape, jailbreak and MORE!

[H1]Pros[/h1]
Community still active, not much, around 3k people, but still alive
Graphics are decent tho, even from source engine
Physics are decent. A bit weird, but fun
There is tons of weapon mods on gamebanana in case you want to test, like csgo skins, but for cs source, some cod weapons.
Fancy steam achievements

[H1]Neutral[/h1]
Some people buys this game for gmod textures, but meh.. its their decision

[H1]Cons[/h1]
Nothing to say.

[H1]Mark: [/h1]10/10.

M8, this game is so addicting, get the fucking game right now, what are you waiting for? Go get some frags
